alert.note: Alert for Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 2:20PM CDT until June 13 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kaufman County in north central Texas... Northwestern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 219 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mesquite, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Terrell, Seagoville, Forney, Kaufman, Canton, Wills Point, Crandall, Combine, Talty, Edgewood, New Terrell City Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Myrtle Springs, Elmo, Oak Grove, Post Oak Bend City, Oak Ridge, Ola, Alsa and Jackson. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 486 and 523. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm has a history of producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
